title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 205.4 - Nomination for advisory board membership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 205.4 - Nomination for advisory board membership

State Regulations
(a) The commissioner shall solicit
nominations from New York cabbage growers, New York cabbage processing
associations and New York cabbage handler associations, to be eligible for
appointment to the advisory board. (b) Not more than one member shall be
appointed from any single grower, processor or handler operation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
205.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
